title: Oriental vegetable soup
ingredients: ['100 g (3½ oz) baby pak choi (Chinese cabbage)', '85 g (3 oz) carrots', '4 spring onions', '50 g (1¾ oz) shiitake mushrooms', '60 g (2¼ oz) tofu', '4 thin slices ginger', '1 clove garlic', '600 ml (1 pint) chicken stock', '1 tablespoon soy sauce, or to taste', 'Black pepper']
